queryHandle.description: Query handle to validate (from wit-get-work-items-by-query-wiql with returnQueryHandle=true)

includeSampleItems.description: Fetch and include sample items (first 5) with titles and states (default false)

title: wit-validate-query-handle
description: Validate a query handle and get metadata about stored query results. Returns item count, expiration time, original query, and optionally fetches sample items. Use this to check if a handle is still valid before bulk operations.
